attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Id of the component

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the visibility of the component

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An EL expression that maps to a server-side component instance in a backing bean

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Value of the component that can be either an EL expression or a literal text

attribute.name: var
attribute.description: Name of the request-scoped variable that'll be used as the holder of each rowdata before processing a row

attribute.name: rows
attribute.description: Number of rows to display per page

attribute.name: first
attribute.description: Index of the first row to be displayed

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Javascript variable name of the wrapped yui widget

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Type of the list, valid values are "unordered"(default), "ordered" and "definition".

attribute.name: itemType
attribute.description: Specifies how items would be displayed.

attribute.name: paginator
attribute.description: Enables paginator, default value is false

attribute.name: paginatorTemplate
attribute.description: Template for the paginator layout, default value is "{FirstPageLink} {PreviousPageLink} {PageLinks} {NextPageLink} {LastPageLink}"

attribute.name: rowsPerPageTemplate
attribute.description: Template for the rowsPerPage dropdown

attribute.name: currentPageReportTemplate
attribute.description: Template for the {currentPageReport} UI.

attribute.name: pageLinks
attribute.description: Number of pageLinks to display when paginator is enabled, defaults to 10 at most.

attribute.name: firstPageLinkLabel
attribute.description: Label of the first link paginator

attribute.name: previousPageLinkLabel
attribute.description: Label of the previous link paginator

attribute.name: nextPageLinkLabel
attribute.description: Label of the next link paginator

attribute.name: lastPageLinkLabel
attribute.description: Label of the last link paginator

attribute.name: paginatorPosition
attribute.description: Position of the paginator, valid values are "both","top","bottom".

attribute.name: paginatorAlwaysVisible
attribute.description: Defines if paginator should be hidden when number of rows displayed is less than paginator rowsPerPage option.

attribute.name: page
attribute.description: Index of the current page, first page is 1.

attribute.name: effect
attribute.description: Enabled fade effect during pagination.

attribute.name: effectSpeed
attribute.description: Speed of the fade effect during pagination.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Style of the main container of datagrid.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the main container of datagrid.
